Sword.description: A sharp-looking sword, perfect for close combat.

Axe.description: A heavy battle axe, capable of dealing massive damage.

Dagger.description: A small but lethal dagger, ideal for stealth attacks.

Bow.description: A finely crafted bow with a quiver full of arrows.

Magic Staff.description: An enchanted staff, brimming with arcane energy.

Helmet.description: A bronze helmet offering protection for the head.

Potion of healing.description: A small vial filled with a glowing red liquid that instantly restores a portion of the drinker's health.

Great potion of healing.description: A larger vial containing a radiant red liquid, capable of restoring a significant amount of health.
